name: When Thoughts Collide
description:
A story about a family in the 18th century, a man of big actions, yet very few words; a woman full of love, with little received back; a boy who plays piano, in the room next to their fights.

Themes: abusive relationships/families, your usual 18th century wife wants to be free from her husband's controlling attitude

--------------------------------------------

Author's Notes:

Hi! This was  meant to be a 3 act game with the other 2 acts showcasing the point of views of the son and husband. However, the reason it was not continued was due to an EXTREMELY short due date (this was made a day before it's supposed to be passed) for my english class and I'm quite busy!  However,  I hope to finish the other two acts soon with better graphics that is not taken from google </3
